ya5.2.2:2.1: bhaṅgakkhaṇe → bhaṅgakkhaṇe asaññasattaṁ upapajjantānaṁ (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1, csp1ed)
ya5.2.2:32.1: arahantānaṁ yassa cittassa anantarā aggamaggaṁ paṭilabhissanti → paṭilabhissanti tassa cittassa uppādakkhaṇe (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1)
ya5.2.2:76.1: uppādakkhaṇe taṇhāvippayuttacitte vattamāne → nirodhasamāpannānaṁ asaññasattānaṁ (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1)
ya5.2.2:152.1: asaññasattaṁ upapajjantānaṁ arūpe aggamaggassa ca phalassa ca bhaṅgakkhaṇe → arūpe maggassa ca phalassa ca bhaṅgakkhaṇe asaññasattaṁ upapajjantānaṁ (cck), arūpe maggassa ca phalassa ca bhaṅgakkhaṇe apāyaṁ asaññasattaṁ upapajjantānaṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts1ed), arūpe maggamaggassa ca phalassa ca bhaṅgakkhaṇe, asaññasattaṁ upapajjantānaṁ (csp1ed)
